user.title: Set up Crestron XSIG
user.description: Configure the port for your Crestron XSIG gateway. Join configuration can be done after setup via the Configure button.

data_description.port: The UDP port for the XSIG gateway (typically 16384)

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use. Please choose a different port or stop the service using it.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This port is already configured. Use a different port for multiple Crestron systems.

init.title: Manage Crestron Joins
init.description: Choose an action to manage your to_joins (HA→Crestron feedback) and from_joins (Crestron→HA scripts).

add_to_join.title: Add to_join (HA → Crestron)
add_to_join.description: Send Home Assistant state to Crestron for feedback. The join will update Crestron whenever the entity state changes.

data_description.join: Join number (e.g., d15 for digital, a10 for analog, s5 for serial)
data_description.attribute: Entity attribute to send (e.g., brightness). Leave blank to send state.
data_description.value_template: Advanced: Jinja2 template for custom value logic

add_from_join.title: Add from_join (Crestron → HA)
add_from_join.description: Run a Home Assistant service when Crestron triggers this join. Useful for button presses and macros.

data_description.join: Join number (e.g., d100 for digital button press)

select_join_to_edit.title: Select Join to Edit
select_join_to_edit.description: Choose a join to edit. The form will be pre-filled with current values.

remove_joins.title: Remove Joins
remove_joins.description: Select one or more joins to remove. The integration will reload after removal.

add_cover.title: Add Cover Entity
add_cover.description: Create a cover (shade/blind) entity. Position join is required (analog). Optional joins add feedback and control features.

data_description.name: Friendly name for this cover (e.g., Living Room Shade)
data_description.pos_join: Analog join for position control (e.g., a30)
data_description.is_opening_join: Digital join for opening state feedback (e.g., d31)
data_description.is_closing_join: Digital join for closing state feedback (e.g., d32)
data_description.is_closed_join: Digital join for closed state feedback (e.g., d33)
data_description.stop_join: Digital join for stop command (e.g., d34)

add_binary_sensor.title: Add Binary Sensor Entity
add_binary_sensor.description: Create a binary sensor entity for digital state monitoring (on/off, open/closed, etc.). Device class determines the icon and behavior.

data_description.name: Friendly name for this sensor (e.g., Front Door Motion)
data_description.is_on_join: Digital join for state feedback (e.g., d100)

select_entity_to_edit.title: Select Entity to Edit
select_entity_to_edit.description: Choose an entity to edit. The form will be pre-filled with current values.

remove_entities.title: Remove Entities
remove_entities.description: Select one or more entities to remove. The integration will reload after removal.

add_dimmer_mode.title: Choose Join Assignment Mode
add_dimmer_mode.description: How should button joins be assigned?

add_dimmer_simple.title: Add Dimmer/Keypad (Auto-Sequential)
add_dimmer_simple.description: System auto-assigns joins sequentially from base join. Button actions configured via HA automations. LED bindings use select dropdowns.

data_description.name: Friendly name (e.g., Kitchen Keypad)
data_description.base_join: First digital join (e.g., d10). System auto-assigns: d10=press, d11=double, d12=hold, d13-d15=button2, etc.
data_description.button_count: Number of buttons (2-6). Each button uses 3 sequential joins.
data_description.has_lighting_load: Does this dimmer control a light?

add_dimmer_manual.title: Add Dimmer/Keypad (Manual)
add_dimmer_manual.description: Manually specify each button join. Useful for non-sequential join assignments. Button actions configured via HA automations. LED bindings use select dropdowns.

data_description.name: Friendly name (e.g., Kitchen Keypad)
data_description.button_count: Number of buttons (2-6). Changing this updates the form.
data_description.button_1_press: Digital join for button 1 press (e.g., d10)
data_description.button_1_double: Digital join for button 1 double press (e.g., d20)
data_description.button_1_hold: Digital join for button 1 hold (e.g., d30)
data_description.button_2_press: Digital join for button 2 press (e.g., d11)
data_description.button_2_double: Digital join for button 2 double press (e.g., d21)
data_description.button_2_hold: Digital join for button 2 hold (e.g., d31)
data_description.button_3_double: Digital join for button 3 double press
data_description.button_4_double: Digital join for button 4 double press
data_description.button_5_double: Digital join for button 5 double press
data_description.button_6_double: Digital join for button 6 double press
data_description.has_lighting_load: Does this dimmer control a light?

dimmer_menu.title: Manage Dimmers/Keypads
dimmer_menu.description: Configure Crestron dimmers and keypads with button actions and lighting loads.

remove_dimmers.title: Remove Dimmers/Keypads
remove_dimmers.description: Select one or more dimmers/keypads to remove. Associated entities will be removed from Home Assistant.

error.invalid_join_format: Join must be in format: d1-d4096, a1-a1024, or s1-s1024 (e.g., d15, a10, s5)
error.join_already_exists: This join number is already configured. Remove it first or use a different join number.
error.join_conflict: One or more joins conflict with existing configurations.
error.join_range_exceeded: Base join too high. Need room for button_count × 3 sequential joins (max d4096).
error.entity_already_exists: An entity with this name already exists. Choose a different name.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.
